name: MAZE (itch) (Skipper9904)
description:
HOW TO PLAY THE GAME?

THE GOAL IS TO ISOLATE THE INFECTED NPC'S (RED) TO AVOID TO INFECT THE HEALTHY NPC'S (GREEN). 

 CREATE WALLS TO ISOLATE ALL INFECTED NPC'S TO ACHIEVE THE NEXT LEVEL. 

BE CAREFUL! YOU ONLY HAVE A LIMITED NUMBER OF WALLS YOU CAN PLACE. AS SOON AS MORE THEN THE HALF OF ALL NPC'S ARE INFECTED, YOU LOST THE GAME. 

HAVE FUN!
